text: @DavidJUrban @HillaryClinton @JoeBiden @realDonaldTrump Your lies make me sick. In fact, your president’s lies about #coronavirus are making lots of Americans sick and even killing tens of thousands. We are wise to your Mr. #Trump and his #GOP enablers, racists,  misogynists, and just plain mean-spirited human beings.
